messages.message: @Kerry those are good questions, will confirm back on this once Puneet is back in on Monday

@Kerry The fix should not affect the logs, I think the issue with trace ID not getting injected in the logs is because of a patch that I added during debugging this issue and forgot to remove it. I have removed the patch now so the logs should have the trace ID now.

```kind: Deployment
spec:
  template:
    spec:
      containers:
        - name: api-server
          env:
            - name: JAEGER_TRACEID_128BIT
              value: "true"```
